description: Request to get a single page of files from the user's download list for files that are currently available for download.

nextPageToken.description: Forward the resulting nextPageToken from a previous request to get the next page of results

sortByColumn.description: Identifies the column to be used to sort the results.

sortByDirection.description: Identifies the direction of the sort.

nameContains.description: Optional: Case insensitive part of the name to filter by name.
